    • Customer

      public Customer(String _username, int _age, double _currentBal)
      This constructor creates a model of a user and inserts it into the db
      Parameters:
      _username - - intended username
      _age - - age of the customer
      _currentBal - - Honest balance provided by the customer

    • getCustomerBalance

      public static double getCustomerBalance(int id)
      Given a concrete customerID, this method goes through the sqlite database and returns the double for their current balance
      Parameters:
      id - - int - Customer id to find balance
      Returns:
      the Customers balance - if invalid search return 0.0

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)
      Given a concrete customer, this method sets their new username with a given name
      Parameters:
      username - - new username

    • setAge

      public void setAge(int age)
      Given a concrete customer and new age, this method sets the customers age
      Parameters:
      age - - updated age

    • checkAge

      public static boolean checkAge(int _age)
      Parameters:
      _age - - age provided by the customer
      Returns:
      - boolean to check if the customer is or is older than 16

    • takeMoneyFromAcc

      public static void takeMoneyFromAcc(double amount, int customerID)
      this method takes in an amount and a customers id in order to take out a certain amount from their account, mainly used in the purchasing method
      Parameters:
      amount - - Amount to be taken
      customerID - - ID of the customers account
